summary: Minor fixes and tweaks to Auriel's Shield.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Better Auriels Shield
Version: 1.1
Date: 09/03/2012
Author: popcorn71


Requirements
============
Dawnguard
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE[/url]


Details
=======
Minor fixes and tweaks to Auriel's Shield done as a request from a user of one of my other mods.

Changes to Auriel's Shield are as fallows:
Fix for wrong keywords assigned to shield. Had WeapMaterialElven when it should have
ArmorMaterialElven. Also assigned keyword ArmorMaterialElvenGilded to it for use with Gilded Elven
Armor and any mods that may expand the Gilded Elven Armor set.

Adds a simple script to set shields armor type to whatever the player has the highest skill in. If
the player specializes in heavy armor then the shield will stay heavy armor otherwise it will change
to light armor.
Item weight will also be adjusted accordingly.

Quadruples vendor value from 750 to 3000.


Install
=======
1. Download and extract the content of Better Auriels Shield archive into you Skyrim data folder.
2. Start the Skyrim Launcher and place a check mark next to 'Better Auriels Shield.esp'.
3. Have fun playing Skyrim.


Uninstall
=========
Delete 'Better Auriels Shield.esp' from your data folder.
Delete file Scripts/AurielsShieldAdjusterEffect.pex
Delete file Scripts/AurielsShieldAdjusterQuest.pex
Delete file Scripts/Source/AurielsShieldAdjusterEffect.psc
Delete file Scripts/Source/AurielsShieldAdjusterQuest.psc


Incompatibility
===============
Mods that make changes to Auriel's Shield.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None known


Contact
=======
The best way to reach me is by PM on the Nexus.
I also check the comments section regularly, so chances are good I will see and respond to feedback
as needed in a few days.


Tools Used
==========
Creation Kit
